## Hypertension

```{r Hypertension}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(gtsummary)
ht_pt <-harmonized_combined %>% 
  filter(CCC_071 == 1) %>%
  select(year,Province,WTS_M) %>%
  rename('Hypertension'=Province)

ht_tb <-survey::svydesign(id=~0,  weights=~WTS_M, data=ht_pt) %>%
  tbl_svysummary(by = 'year', statistic = 'Hypertension' ~"{p}", missing = "no")%>%
  bold_labels()
h<-print(ht_tb)

```

## Diabetes

```{r Diabetes}
db_pt <-harmonized_combined %>%
  filter(CCC_101 == 1) %>%
  select(year,Province,WTS_M) %>%
  group_by(year,Province)%>%
  rename('Diabetes'=Province)

db_tb <-survey::svydesign(id=~0, weights=~WTS_M, data=db_pt) %>%
  tbl_svysummary(by = 'year',statistic = 'Diabetes' ~"{p}", missing = "no") %>%
  bold_labels()
h<-print(db_tb)
```
